item.description:
Long Weekend Trip to Costa Rica - May 15, 2013

Join Global Expeditions Club members from all over the US and Canada on this fun Group Long Weekend trip to Costa Rica!

>>>>CLICK HERE for trip details & itinerary

May 15-19, 2013 You asked for a LONG WEEKEND trip and we're delivering. A quick 5 hour flight from the US, Costa Rica is the perfect weekend getaway! Why not join a group of fun, like-minded people on an exciting 5 day 4 night Global Expeditions Travel Club Long Weekend group tour to Costa Rica.

You'll rappel down waterfalls, hike near an active volcano, rest in natural hot springs, and zipline across the roof of the jungle. You'll even have a free day where you can choose to relax and enjoy the beautiful town of La Fortuna OR continue the adventure and take an optional whitewater rafting ride down Class 3-4 rapids, ride a beautiful horse through the stunning countryside along the base of the volcano, or enjoy an ATV tour through a local farm. Either way, you're bound to see indigenous animals up close, experience nature at its purest and best, but most of all experience this adventure with friends both old and new.

-----------------------------------------------------------------

GET THE SCOOP! Want to see what other club members are saying? Then check out the Global Expeditions Club's Testimonial Page.

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Pricing and Booking:

NOTE: a meetup RSVP does NOT reserve your space. For prices, details and to book your space on this tour, follow this link: www.HeadOutAdventures.com

PRICE: $999

CLICK HERE to book your spot.

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Included in this adventure:
* Private transportation between cities
* Meals as indicated in the itinerary
* Canyoneering and rappelling down 4 waterfalls
* Guided volcano base walk and entrance to the Baldi Natural hot springs
* Canopy zipline rides across the roof of the jungle
* 5 Days, 4 Nights accommodations at excellent locally-owned mid-range hotels & lodges
* OPTIONAL: horseback ride, ATV tour or Class 3-4 whitewater rafting
* OPTIONAL: extra night hotel before near San Jose airport (available on checkout)

Need help booking your airfare? Just email me or give me a call at 1.617.645.7689

Click Here For Complete Details and Booking.

Places Visited: Costa Rica Group Tour, Arenal Volcano, La Fortuna, Lake Arenal, Baldi Hot Springs, San Jose

-----------------------------------------------------------------

This group tour is being organized by the Global Expeditions Club: an international adventure travel club with over 20,000+ members. Check out the Global Expeditions Club's Testimonial Page to see what members are saying about these trips.

The tour operator that they are using to coordinate, book and run this trip is: Head Out Adventures.

For more information visit their websites or contact the Global Expeditions Club at:

E-mail: info@GlobalExpeditionsClub.com
Phone: 1.617.645.7689

And, of course, if you have any questions you can always contact me or one of the other organizers through a meetup email!!

Make Friends. Travel the World.
item.name: COSTA RICA: Long Weekend Adventure - 5 Days
